meanings.definition: Speak to or treat with disrespect or scornful abuse.
meanings.sent1: She insults her classmates by calling them names.
meanings.sent2: He insults others by making fun of their appearance.
meanings.sent3: The parrot insults visitors by mimicking their voices.
meanings.sent4: The storm insults the fragile flowers with its harsh winds.
meanings.sent5: The bully insults his victims to feel powerful.

meanings.sent1: His comment was an insult to her intelligence.
meanings.sent2: She felt hurt by the insults directed at her.
meanings.sent3: The cat's refusal to eat the new food was an insult to the chef.
meanings.sent4: The graffiti on the wall was an insult to the neighborhood's beauty.
meanings.sent5: The broken promise was an insult to their friendship.
